newsitem.title: BARBADOS: CRICKET-WALSH SET TO RETURN FOR FOURTH TEST.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-WALSH SET TO RETURN FOR FOURTH TEST.

text.p: West Indies captain Courtney Walsh is expected to return after injury for the fourth test against India starting in St John's, Antigua, on Friday.
Fast bowler Walsh is in an unchanged squad of 13, having been ruled out by a hamstring injury from the third test which ended here at Kensington Oval on Monday.
Brian Lara took over the captaincy and led West Indies to a 38-run victory which gave them a 1-0 lead in the five-test series.

West Indies 13: Courtney Walsh (captain), Sherwin Campbell, Stuart Williams, Shivnarine Chanderpaul, Brian Lara, Carl Hooper, Roland Holder, Courtney Browne, Ian Bishop, Curtly Ambrose, Franklyn Rose, Mervyn Dillon, Rawl Lewis.
